Function	Component of the large ribosomal subunit (PubMed:12962325, PubMed:23636399, PubMed:25901680, PubMed:25957688, PubMed:32669547). Required for proper rRNA processing and maturation of 28S and 5.8S rRNAs (PubMed:25424902).
